Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 49,000 SF Institutional Quality Three-story Office Educational Building

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Excellent location immediately off Interstate 91 at Exit 38 in the Day Hill Corporate Area of Windsor
Signature Class A office building with superior access and visibility on Day Hill Road
Attractive asking lease rate of $18.50/SF Gross

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 100 Corporate Drive is a signature, Class A office property featuring generous on-site parking and a quiet, well-landscaped setting with excellent access and visibility on Day Hill Road. The property is under new ownership and offers an attractive asking lease rate of $18.50/SF full-service gross. Current tenants include ADP, HMS, Sedgwick, Diplomat Pharmacy, and SAVKAR.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
55,000 SF of office space available for lease at 415 Day Hill Road in Windsor, Connecticut. This office space is located approximately 1/2 mile from Interstate 91 in the Day Hill corporate area of Windsor.

• Available SF: 55,000 SF
• Built: 2002
• Parking: 380 spaces
• Acres: 9.78
• Lease Rate: $10.00/SF NNN

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 10 Griffin Road North is in proximity to Interstate 91, Route 187, Springfield, MA and just minutes from Bradley International Airport.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CT. The 48,000 SF Class A office building
